ModMetaData.name: Room Temperature Display
ModMetaData.author: hawqeye19
ModMetaData.description:
Displays each room's temperature directly on the map, helping you monitor heating and cooling at a glance.
• Small wall-adjacent labels when the temperature overlay is off. • Large centered labels when the in-game temperature overlay is on. Configured in settings. • Uses base game options for displaying in Farenheit, Celsius, or Kelvin. • Optional color gradients for cold, comfortable, and hot ranges. • Settings menu to adjust comfort thresholds and gradient behavior. • Toggle display with a Play Settings button (green checkmark when active). • Labels only appear on proper rooms or partially roofed (ignores doorways). Use the Gizmo to hide and show labels. • Automatically updates when room shapes, roofing, or temperature change. • Gizmo under the Orders tab in Architect for toggling ON and OFF a singular room. • Hotkeys (default to not set) available under Controls > Keyboard Configuration > In-Game Global section called 'Toggle Room Temperature Display' and 'Toggle Vanilla Temperature Overlay'.
Requires Harmony.
